results.notes: One HIGH severity vulnerability detected in Python wheel package. No critical vulnerabilities.
No high or critical vulnerabilities observed. Acceptable risk for honeypot deployment.
Only low severity issues detected in base OS packages.
Medium severity vulnerability present, no direct exploit impact due to isolated honeypot usage.

conclusion: No critical vulnerabilities found across PhantomNet honeypot containers. Identified vulnerabilities are acceptable within an isolated, non-production honeypot environment.
